Name: True or False
About the game: From the creator of Pythagoria & Aurora Nights Take a quiz to test your intuition and knowledge - and learn some interesting and specific facts along the way. Your goal is simple: decide whether the statements are true or false. Some of them may seem pretty crazy, but they are true; while other 'facts' are actually false. Is there a chocolate-scented flower? You will soon know the answer! Key Features Over 200 surprising and entertaining facts. Calm and relaxing OST. DRM-free. You can play the game anywhere anytime!
